revision.comment: add missing final period (full stop) in 'From ...' line (5)
revision.text: ==Central Huasteca Nahuatl== ===Etymology=== From {{der|nch|nci|xocotl}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|nch|/ʃokotɬ/}} ===Noun=== {{head|nch|noun}} # [[citric]] fruit. # {{lb|nch|Orizatlán}}: [[plum]] # {{lb|nch|Huejutla}}: [[orange]] ===References=== * Isidro Reyes, Valentín (2012); [http://200.23.113.51/pdf/28573.pdf ''Vocabulario nauatl-español, material de apoyo para la enseñanza de la lengua nauatl''], Ixtapalapa variant from Yahualica, Hidalgo, Universidad Pedagógica Nacional, Área de diversidad intercultural, Mexico City, Mexico. Page 70. [[Category:nch:Fruits]] ---- ==Central Nahuatl== ===Alternative forms=== * {{sense|Amecameca, Cholula and Milpa Alta}} {{l|nhn|xocotl}} ===Etymology=== From {{der|nhn|nci|xocotl}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|nhn|/ʃokotɬ/}} ===Noun=== {{nhn-noun|i}} # {{lb|nhn|Tlaxcala}} [[peach]] [[Category:Tlaxcala Central Nahuatl]] {{c|nhn|Fruits}} ---- ==Eastern Huasteca Nahuatl== ===Alternative forms=== * {{sense|Chicontepec}} {{l|nhe|xocotl}} ===Etymology=== From {{der|nhe|nci|xocotl}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|nhe|/ʃo.kotɬ/}} ===Noun=== {{head|nhe|noun}} # [[plum]] {{c|nhe|Fruits}} ---- ==Guerrero Nahuatl== ===Etymology=== From {{der|ngu|nci|xocotl}}. ===Noun=== {{head|ngu|noun}} # [[plum]] {{c|ngu|Fruits}} ---- ==Orizaba Nahuatl== ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|nlv|/ʃokotɬ/}} ===Noun=== {{head|nlv|noun}} # [[orange]] ===References=== * Tepole Ortega, Lucía 2012; [http://www.aveli.gob.mx/files/2013/08/E_L_NZ.pdf Náhuatl de Sierra de Zongolica ], AVELI, Gobierno del estado de Veracruz, Xalapa, Mexico. {{c|nlv|Fruits}} ---- ==Sierra Negra Nahuatl== ===Etymology=== ===Noun=== {{head|nsu|noun}} # [[lemon]]. [[Category:nsu:Fruits]] ---- ==Western Huasteca Nahuatl== ===Etymology=== From {{der|nhw|nci|xocotl}}. ===Noun=== {{head|nhw|noun}} # [[plum]] {{c|nhw|Fruits}}
